line: I insert one of the keys and the lock opens with a sharp click.
The thief runs out of the cell and hugs the maid.
But instead, she simply phases right through.
Just a moment after trying to hug the maid, the thief's body begins to shine with a blinding ligt.
We both close our eyes, and when the light subsides the only thing left after the thief is a small glowing sphere.
I reach out to it, and it instantly disappears into my hand.
